meanings.definition: hirees: plural form of hiree, a person who is hired for a job or service.
meanings.sent1: The company welcomed the new hirees with a warm orientation session.
meanings.sent2: The manager interviewed several hirees for the open positions.
meanings.sent3: The hirees at the office party were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: The team of hirees transformed the project with their fresh ideas.
meanings.sent5: The hirees quickly adapted to their roles and became valuable assets to the company.
